name: Grappler (GMTK jam)
description:
This is a game made in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam, and the first game I've ever uploaded to the internet.

You're in a platformer, but you can't move!

Looks like you'll have to use these grappling hooks to drag and swing your way to the exit. Red things hurt you, and you can grapple and swing them around (solid red things can't be swung, but can still be grappled to). The exit is a pink square

If a red thing hits another red thing, they will both be destroyed.

Controls: Left and right click to grapple. Both clicks have different hooks, so use both of them at once for more control and speed

Huge thanks to @diekie for patiently helping me with a seemingly unsolvable jar file problem, if he hadn't helped me this game and all the work that went into it would never have been submitted to the jam
